        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Wht is a Cinderella story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist eine Aschenputtel Geschichte weiß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Blanche est une histoire de Cendrillon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Branca é uma história de Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bianca è una storia della Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Wht είναι μια ιστορία Cinderella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Blanca es una historia de Cinderella</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the students understand and chart the components of a Cinderella like story.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fairy tales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität verstehen die Kursteilnehmer 
und entwerfen die Bestandteile von einem Aschenputtel wie Geschichte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants comprennent et
dressent une carte les composants d'une Cendrillon comme l'histoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os estudantes compreendem e fazem 
um mapa dos componentes de uma Cinderella como a história.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività gli allievi capiscono e 
progettano i componenti di una Cinderella come la storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι σπουδαστές καταλαβαίνουν
και σχεδιάζουν τα συστατικά ενός Cinderella όπως την ιστορία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los estudiantes entienden y 
planean los componentes de una Cinderella como historia.</string>
          </description>
